question: Does your organisation have someone in charge of cybersecurity?

quest: What is this person's name, title, and contact information?
Does this individual have the authority to shutdown all systems during a cyber attack?
If not, who has this authority?
Does your organisation have a communication plan for a cyberattack?
Does it outline how employees should report suspicious activity?
Does it outline how information and updates regarding an attack will be shared internally and externally?
Has the communication plan been tested for effectiveness?
Has your organisation been in touch with cyber security experts/advisors from outside your organizations regarding your planned response to a cyber attack?
Have you already called on cyber security experts/advisors from outside your organizations in response to a cyber attack of any kind?
